body.text: Buttons and Cards Guidelines & Best Practices

* Webex Teams supports Adaptive Cards 1.1.
* All card elements are available for use except *Media*.
* Includes all card properties except *backgroundImage*, *iconUrl*, and *speak*.
* Messages with cards may include up to 10 images.
* Only one card can be sent per request.
* The card's content cannot be changed after it's created.

* Since the content  of a Card cannot be changed after it's created, you could instead remove the card and post a message with the result of the action. To remove a card, simply delete the message that contains the card attachment. The card will be removed from the space.

* In cases where deleting the card is not feasible, such as in a group space where you want multiple people to interact with the Card, you could send each user a 1:1 message after they've interacted with it.
